artist: Etcher: Jan Meyssens; Painter: After Johann Wilhelm Baur
description: bare headed man wearing shirt with wide lece edged collar and left arm across body; after a self portrait
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate below image in black: [JEAN GUILLAUME BAUUR/ Natif de Strasburg, il faisoit merveille en la miniature il demcuré a Rome chez le duc de/ Brassgnano. l\'an il est venu vers l\'Empereur d Almaigne/ Ferdinand, a Vieneristant son paintre, morut l \'an 1640/ Jo. Guillemus Bauur pinxit   J. Meyssens fecit et excudit]; above image upper right in brown: [r(?)3]; on sheet in pencil: [ 79  1-91]; on verso in pencil: [2/]
title: Portrait of Jean Guillaume Bauur
